attributes.action: Would like to make the 12th and the 13th of July a National Holiday for Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to propose that it would be appropriate for the 12th and the 13th of July to be a National Holiday for Northern Ireland as it is large gathering for many people in the community, and some are unable to enjoy it as it is not a holiday and have to book it as a holiday from work, this is unfair as St Patricks day is a national holiday for the Irish and those of the Northern Irish community would respect if theirs was a National Holiday also.
